info.title: TPC Portal
info.description: The Portal Connector (TPC) is the leading alternative for delivering Customer Engagement portals connected to Microsoft Dynamics 365. The TPC Portal Connector enables organizations and businesses to capture triggers based on the interaction of portal users within The Portal Connector. The Connector also enables administrators to execute actions within The Portal Connector like assigning roles, creating content, and managing common processes.

post.description: Create content on the portal site.
Delete content on the portal site.
Edit content on the portal site.
Get all content on the portal site.
Get content on the portal site.

get.description: Trigger a metadata sync on the portal site.

post.description: Publish content on the portal site.
Create a portal user on the portal site.
Edit a portal user on the portal site.
Get a portal user on the portal site.
Deletes a portal user on the portal site.
Get all portal users on the portal site.
Assign a role to a sitefinity user on the portal site.
Unassign a role from a sitefinity user on the portal site.
Unpublish content on the portal site.
Lockout a user on the portal site.
Unlock a user on the portal site.
Retrieve a list of all content types on the portal site.
Resolve a content schema for a specific content type of the portal site.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all frontend pages on the portal site.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Object that is used to hold portal user information for create.

comment.description: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.

email.description: Gets or sets the email address for the membership user.

isApproved.description: Gets or sets whether the membership user can be authenticated.

isBackendUser.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a backend user.

password.description: Sets the password for the user.

passwordAnswer.description: Sets the password answer for the user.

passwordQuestion.description: Gets the password question for the membership user.

about.description: Gets or sets a descriptive text about the user.

firstName.description: Gets or sets the users first name.

lastName.description: Gets or sets the users last name.

nickname.description: Gets or sets the nickname of the user.

sourceKey.description: Gets or sets a field that can be used for synchronization with external content systems.

crmContactId.description: Gets or sets CRM contact id.

crmUserId.description: Gets or sets CRM user id.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Object that is used to hold portal user and profile information.

comment.description: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.

email.description: Gets or sets the email address for the membership user.

id.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the user.

isApproved.description: Gets or sets whether the membership user can be authenticated.

isBackendUser.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a backend user.

isLockedOut.description: Gets a value indicating whether the membership user is locked out and unable to be validated.

isLoggedIn.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the membership user is logged in.

isOnline.description: Gets whether the user is currently online.

lastLoginDate.description: Gets or sets the date and time that the user was last authenticated.

lastLoginIp.description: Gets or sets the IP address of the last user login.

lastModified.description: The date on which the content was last modified.

passwordFormat.description: Gets or sets the password format.

passwordQuestion.description: Gets the password question for the membership user.

providerName.description: Gets the name of the membership provider that stores and retrieves user information for the user.

userName.description: Gets the username of the membership user.

about.description: Gets or sets a descriptive text about the user.

avatar.description: Gets or sets the image used as an avatar.

dateCreated.description: Gets the date and time the profile was created.

firstName.description: Gets or sets the users first name.

lastName.description: Gets or sets the users last name.

nickname.description: Gets or sets the nickname of the user.

owner.description: Gets the identifier of the profiles user.

sourceKey.description: Gets or sets a field that can be used for synchronization with external content systems.

crmContactId.description: Gets or sets CRM contact id.

crmParentCustomerId.description: Gets or sets CRM parent customer id.

crmParentCustomerType.description: Gets or sets CRM parent customer type (account, systemuser, etc).

crmUserId.description: Gets or sets CRM user id.

crmContactPriceListId.description: Gets or sets CRM contact price list id.

crmPortalUserId.description: Gets or sets CRM portal user id.

status.description: Boolean that indicates whether the request failed (false) or succeeded (true).

message.description: Message that summarizes the results of the request.

typeFullName.description: Full name of the content type.

typeDisplayName.description: Display name of the content type.

requestFullName.description: Full name of the request object that will be used for the specified type and operation.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Page Nodes Portal Response Message.

status.description: Boolean that indicates whether the request failed (false) or succeeded (true).

message.description: Message that summarizes the results of the request.

count.description: Total number of page node items.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Object that is used to hold page node information.

approvalWorkflowState.description: Gets or sets the current state of the item in the approval workflow.

attributes.description: Gets a dictionary of taxonomy attributes for this content.

availableCultures.description: Gets cultures available for this item.

availableLanguages.description: Gets languages available for this item.

crawlable.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this page can be indexed by external search engines.

dateCreated.description: The date on which the content was created.

extension.description: Gets or sets the extension to be used with the current page with the dot, ex .aspx, .html.

includeInSearchIndex.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to exclude the page from the Sitefinity search engine.

isBackend.description: Gets a value indicating whether this node is a backend node.

isSplitPage.description: Gets a value indicating whether this page is in split mode.

lastModified.description: The date on which the content was last modified.

moduleName.description: Gets or sets the name of the module that this page node depends on.

name.description: Gets or sets the programmatic name of the page node.

nodes.description: Gets a list of child page nodes.

nodeType.description: Gets or sets the type of the page.

ordinal.description: Gets or sets the ordinal number.

owner.description: User id of the owner of the content.

pageId.description: Gets the Id of the page data that is linked to the node.

parentId.description: Gets or sets the parent node.

redirectUrl.description: Gets or sets the URL where the client will be redirected to if the NodeType is set to Redirect.

requireSsl.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this page requires SSL.

showInNavigation.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this page should be shown in the navigation.

urlName.description: Gets or sets the url name of the content item.

urls.description: Collection of url data for this content.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Object that is used to return readonly culture information.

isNeutralCulture.description: Indicates whether this culture is neutral.

isReadOnly.description: Indicates whether or not this culture is read-only.

name.description: Gets the culture name in the format languagecode2-country/regioncode2.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Object that is used to return a readonly url information.

disabled.description: Indicates whether or not this url is disabled.

lastModified.description: Date of the last time this url was modified.

queryString.description: The Query string for this url.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Request Used to Notify for a Login.

executingUserId.description: Sitefinity user id of the portal user who executed the action.

loginResult.description: Indicates the final result of the login.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Request object that is used to subscribe for a Login on a Portal site

callBackUrl.description: Callback url of the web hook request.

userId.description: User Id - leave empty to trigger on all user logins.

loginResult.description: Login Result - Leave empty to trigger on all login results.

callBackUrl.description: Callback url of the web hook request.

userId.description: User id - leave empty to trigger on all user logins.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Object that is used to hold comment information.

dateCreated.description: Date that the comment was created.

lastModified.description: Date that the comment was last modified.

message.description: Gets or sets the body/message of the comment.

rating.description: Gets the rating of the comment.

status.description: Gets or sets the status of the comment.

threadKey.description: Gets or sets the thread key (will be the content type of the commented item) of the comment.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Object that is used to hold author information.

name.description: Gets the name of the author.

email.description: Gets the email of the author.

key.description: Gets the key of the author.

contentId.description: Content id - leave empty to trigger on all content.

executingUserId.description: Sitefinity user id of the portal user who executed the action.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Object that is used to hold form information.

allowComments.description: Indicates whether or not comments are allowed on the content item.

availableCultures.description: Gets cultures available for this item.

availableLanguages.description: Gets languages available for this item.

controls.description: Gets the identifier of all the form controls.

cssClass.description: Gets the CSS class of the form control.

dateCreated.description: The date on which the content was created.

entriesTypeName.description: Type name of the entries that are created for the form.

framework.description: Gets the form framework (Web Forms = 0, MVC = 1).

id.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the form.

owner.description: User id of the owner of the content.

libraryId.description: Gets the identifier of the library that the form belongs to.

lastModified.description: The date on which the content was last modified.

lastModifiedBy.description: User id of the user who last modified the content.

name.description: Gets the name of the form.

publicationDate.description: Gets or sets the date and time when the content will be publicly available (published).

redirectPageUrl.description: Gets or sets the redirect page URL.

successMessage.description: Gets or sets the success message of the form.

title.description: Gets or sets the title of the form.

uiStatus.description: Gets or sets the UI status of the content item.

urlName.description: Gets or sets the url name of the content item.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the content item.

viewsCount.description: Gets the number of views on the content item.

visible.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not this content is publicly visible.

votesCount.description: Gets the number of votes on the content item.

votesSum.description: Gets the current vote ratio on the content item.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Request object that is used to subscribe for a Form Entry on a Portal site

formId.description: Form id - leave empty to trigger on all form submissions.

callBackUrl.description: Callback url of the web hook request.

resultCount.description: Number of results returned by the TPC Knowledge Search.

results.description: Object that holds an array containing the article information returned by the TPC Knowledge Search.

criteria.description: Search criteria - leave empty to trigger on all searches.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Object that is used to hold page data information.

attributes.description: Gets a dictionary of taxonomy attributes for this content.

availableCultures.description: Gets cultures available for this item.

codeBehindType.description: Gets or sets the name of the code-behind type.

commentsCount.description: Gets the number of comments added to this content.

controls.description: Gets the collection of controls defined for this page.

culture.description: Gets or sets the culture setting for this page. The value must be a valid culture id.

dateCreated.description: The date on which the content was created.

expirationDate.description: Gets or sets the date and time when the content will be unpublished.

externalPage.description: Gets or sets a URL for loading external page from the file system.

htmlTitle.description: Gets or sets the HTML title of the page.

isPersonalized.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page is personalized or not.

keywords.description: Gets or sets the keywords for the page.

languageData.description: Collection of culture specific language data.

lastControlId.description: Gets or sets the last controls id of the page.

lastModified.description: The date on which the content was last modified.

lastModifiedBy.description: User id of the user who last modified the content.

navigationNodeId.description: Gets or sets the navigation node id.

owner.description: User id of the owner of the content.

personalizationMasterId.description: Gets or sets the id of the master if this is a personalized variation.

personalizationSegmentId.description: Gets or sets the id of the segment for which the page is personalized.

publicationDate.description: Gets or sets the date and time when the content will be publicly available (published).

publishedTranslations.description: Gets a list of available translations.

sourceKey.description: Gets or sets a key that can be used for synchronization with external content systems.

status.description: Gets or sets the publication status enumeration.

template.description: Gets or sets the template for this page.

theme.description: Gets or sets the name of the template theme.

themes.description: Gets or sets the name of the template themes.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the content item.

viewsCount.description: Gets the number of views on the content item.

visible.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not this content is publicly visible.

votesCount.description: Gets the number of votes on the content item.

votesSum.description: Gets the current vote ratio on the content item.

resultCount.description: Number of results returned by the Sitefinity search.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Request object that is used to subscribe for a Sitefinity search on a portal site.

criteria.description: Search criteria - leave empty to trigger on all searches.

callBackUrl.description: Callback url of the web hook request.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Request Used to Notify for a Form Submission.

executingUserId.description: Sitefinity user id of the portal user who executed the action.

submissionEntities.description: Object that holds an array containing the entity logical name and unique identifier of all modified entities in CRM and actions performed.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Object that holds information regarding the entity logical name and unique identifier of all modified entities in CRM and actions performed.

message.description: Action that was performed on the entity.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Request object that is used to subscribe for a form submission on a portal site.

formId.description: Form id - Leave empty to trigger on all form submissions.

callBackUrl.description: Callback url of the web hook request.

pavliks.PortalConnector.PowerPlatform.Mo.description: Request Used to Notify for a user event.

executingUserId.description: Sitefinity user id of the portal user who executed the action.
